Text:
You have now been demoted (for now) from ViP to trusted due: 
pestering mods about getting your domain un-blocked
using short urls to get around blocks 
and finally creating a puppet account in order to use that to post torrent with short url redirects to blocked domain

I hope this makes you re-think about some things.
I was hoping he was demoted for upping a torrent and not seeding
